synopsis.text: Goemon, Jigen, and Lupin, three master thieves, find themselves in an unusual predicament when Lupin is kidnapped during a heist and forced to steal the legendary Bull's Eye gemstone, a jewel with a deadly reputation. To make matters worse, the life of Lupin's colleague, Fujiko, hangs in the balance. As they navigate the challenges of this dangerous mission, the trio must also contend with a young, beautiful copycat thief who seems determined to complicate matters. With the stakes high and the odds against them, can Lupin and his friends unravel the mystery of the Bull's Eye and save Fujiko before it's too late? Or will they fall victim to the jewel's curse and the machinations of their mysterious taskmaster? The key to it all may lie in the enigmatic Lupin Collection and the identity of the young thief.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
